name: CastleD
description:
The Game is pretty simple. you have to survive for as long as you can by Avoiding and dodging your way to the HighScore.

The controls are just the Arrow Keys or the WASD to move.

The Game Dev Log:

Assets used: https://kenney.nl/assets/scribble-platformer

The Game was made in one day during the past weekend using only one C# Script.
